name: The Voices Games 3d Collection
description:
A collection of 4 small games from The Voices Games

Ayleouna:

A combination of 3d and 2d platforming where you jump between planets and gravity pads with their own gravity in space with twin stick shooting.

Lizard Lady vs The Cats:

A 3rd person shooter where you kill all the enemies to open the exit from the level.

Lady in a Leotard With a Gun

A 3rd person shooter where you kill all the enemies to open the exit from the level.

Spectrewoods:

A horror themed 3rd person shooter where you follow the flowers which grow out of the ground when you get near to reach the exit
